title: eww more aram bots
body:
Just had an aram game (as you can tell). Got paired up with 2 bots (who just walked up, stood there, and died), and 2 other people who were well mannered, but sadly just plain bad. And then there was me, a shitty lvl 21 surprised that there are people worse than me.
Oh and the other team had 1 bot (who was dc for like the first 10 min; WHERE ARE MY FREE FEED), 1 lvl 30 and other guy carrying (tho they sucked, just much less than my team) and 2 other guys who did a little bit of damage.
Still was fun; bots still are here; and riot's still done nothing (not blaming them; feedbots make aram fun)

/qqend

replies.body:
Yup, there absolutely rampant from level 1-29. They're powerlevellers selling the accounts and this is a tried and true method of getting accounts up without really ever getting caught.

The worst thing is that people don't believe me when I tell them they're bots. No matter what I say, what I do, or try to show them (the constant kamikaze, absolutely never B'ing under any cirucmstances, and never responding EVER when I ask them to say something,, and the general mechanistic nature of how they play) they still don't believe me.

Some of the bots are sophisticated too, so it can be difficult to tell if they're a bot or bad, but watch the patterns and eventually you can tell if it's just a bad player.

Even worse than that, nobody then reports them because they don't believeand then just dismisses me as being "A scrub who can't carry his team".

It's actually insane.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
there are bots in aram? o.O
Not like the A.I. bots in practice mode.

http://s28.postimg.org/6ux5zitkt/aram_bots_op.jpg
when 8/10 players are bots. fun game riot
